title: Don't buy this laptop.... YET! - ASUS Zenbook UX425EA
description: Grab a ModMic Wireless for your favorite headset at   Why is everyone buying and using the ASUS Zenbook? It's not the most powerful, yet not exactly the cheapest... until it goes on sale. Alex decides to take a look!
